short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace references to Donald Trump with other accurate descriptors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View the web through a more accurate lens, in the age of Trump.

This extension replaces the name Trump with other words that describe the 45th President of the United States, including racist, xenophobe, liar, and others.

It also scrubs mentions of the "Alt-right", replacing them with "Neo-nazi".

Note: Will not work with all pages, since text is parsed on page load. Sites such as Facebook that load content dynamically are not compatible with this plugin.
